dataList.name: Joy of Execution
dataList.desc:
After an enemy is defeated, gain 1 Haste and 1 Damage Up next turn.
If this unit defeated an enemy, also gain 1 Fanatic. (Once per turn.)

dataList.name: Highest Honor
dataList.desc:
Apply 1 Attack Power Up and 1 Protection to the ally with the least HP below 50%.
If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic.

dataList.name: Rising Faith
dataList.desc: After an enemy is defeated, apply 1 Haste and 1 Damage Up to the ally with the most SP. (Once per turn.)

dataList.name: Whistles
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, heal 2 allies with the least SP for 15 SP.
If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic.

dataList.name: Whispers
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, heal 1 ally with the least SP for 15 SP.
If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic.

dataList.name: Flaring Up~
dataList.desc: At 30+ SP, inflict +1 Burn Count with the effects of attack skills/coins.

dataList.name: Isn’t It Warm?
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the most SP inflicts +1 Burn Count with the effects of their attack skills/coins.

dataList.name: Rustle Up
dataList.desc:
After defeating an enemy, heal the ally with the least HP for 15 HP. (Once per turn.)
If this unit has an Appetite, spend it to boost the healing based on its Count.

dataList.name: Artistic Flavor
dataList.desc: When an enemy is defeated, the ally with the least HP heals 15 HP. (Once per turn.)

dataList.name: Packed Pies
dataList.desc: Heal 8 HP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Culinary Aid
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, the ally with the least HP heals 5 HP.
Boost the healing of R.B. Chef de Cuisine Ryōshū’s Passive ‘Rustle Up’ by 5.

dataList.name: Mad Flame
dataList.desc: Heal 50% less SP from winning a clash or defeating an enemy.

dataList.name: Cornering
dataList.desc:
1 ally with the least SP deals +10% Blunt damage.
If said ally is below 0 SP, further boost their Blunt damage the lower their SP is. (Max 10%)

dataList.name: Thou Shalt Hammer!
dataList.desc:
If the target has Nails, inflict +1 Tremor Count.
If this unit is Fanatic, inflict +1 Nails.

dataList.name: Hammer of Zealotry
dataList.desc: 1 Fanatic ally with the least SP deals +10% damage.

dataList.name: Here’s to Getting Off Early~
dataList.desc:
When bursting Tremor, spend 3 Charge Count to increase the Stagger Threshold raise by +40%.
After bursting Tremor, gain 1 Haste and 1 Blunt DMG Up next turn.

dataList.name: Resonant Spanner
dataList.desc: When 1 ally with the lowest Speed bursts Tremor, increase the Stagger Threshold raise by +20%.

dataList.name: Chronic Fatigue
dataList.desc:
In a clash, the opponent has -1 Clash Power if they have 5+ Tremor.
When recovering from Stagger, heal 5% of Max HP.

dataList.name: Leave by Suggestion
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the highest Speed lowers the Clash Power of opponents with Tremor by 1.

dataList.name: Rain of Tears
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, spend 1 Sinking Count and lose SP by the current amount of Sinking.
Before being hit by an attack, gain Protection equal to this unit's Sinking. (Up to 5 Protection can be gained per turn)
When hit, gain 1 Blunt DMG Up next turn. (3 per turn)

dataList.name: Ragged Umbrella
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the least SP loses 10 SP when hit by an attack and gains 1 Blunt DMG Up next turn. (Once per turn)

dataList.name: Sawblade Fired Up
dataList.desc: Inflict +1 Rupture to targets with Tremor

dataList.name: Sawblade Maintenance
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed inflicts +1 Rupture to targets with Tremor

dataList.name: Full Bloom
dataList.desc: When attacking 2 or more targets at once, deal +30% damage.

dataList.name: Pungent Spring Breeze
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the least SP deals +10% damage when attacking 2 or more targets at once.

dataList.name: Filling Fluid
dataList.desc: If this unit fails to deal HP damage using attack skills in a turn, gain a shield equal to 5% of Max HP next turn. (Max 30)

dataList.name: Corrosive Slime
dataList.desc: When 1 ally with the highest Speed bursts Tremor, they inflict 2 Rupture.

dataList.name: Regeneration Ampule Activation
dataList.desc:
When hit, if at less than 20% HP, heal by 90% of Max HP and gain 1 K Corp Ampule.
After this activates, gain 1 Fragile every turn for the rest of the battle. (Once per battle)

dataList.name: HIgh-grade Ampule
dataList.desc: At the start of the next turn, give 2 K Corp Ampule to the ally with the lowest HP percentage.

dataList.name: Unfixing Talismans
dataList.desc: On hit, if the target had Rupture, gain 1 Talisman.

dataList.name: Wishing Talisman
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, give (Highest Reson. * 2) Talisman to the ally with the most HP.

dataList.name: Intense Blaze
dataList.desc: Deal +10% Blunt damage for every 3 Burn Count on target. (Max 30%)

dataList.name: Intense Blaze
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the lowest Speed deals +5% Blunt damage for every 3 Burn Count on target. (Max 15%)

dataList.name: Activate rrR-#4 Suit Pressurization
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, Max Speed +2 (Capped at 6) per 5 Charge Count next turn.

dataList.name: Maneuver Training
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, 1 ally with the highest Charge Count gains Max Speed +1 (Capped at 3) per 5 Charge Count next turn.

dataList.name: Defensive Breathing
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, gain 2 Shield per 1 Poise Count. (Max 20)

dataList.name: Designated Protection
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage gains 1 Shield per 1 Poise Count next turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: A Noble Duel
dataList.desc: If Speed of all allies is higher than Speed of all enemies, this unit deals more damage based on the Speed difference between it and the slowest enemy. (+6% per 1 point of difference, Max 30%)

dataList.name: Dueling Request
dataList.desc: If Speed of all allies is higher than Speed of all enemies, the fastest ally deals more damage based on the Speed difference between it and the slowest enemy. (+3% per 1 point of difference, Max 15%)

dataList.name: Crushin' Crabs
dataList.desc: On hit against a target with Tremor, inflict +1 Sinking Count

dataList.name: Crab Driver
dataList.desc: When an ally with the lowest Max HP hits with Heads Coins, they inflict +1 Sinking Count when inflicting Tremor Count on their target with Coin effects.

dataList.name: Unstable Power Output
dataList.desc: On hit with Heads Coins at 10+ Tremor Count on self, Inflict +1 Tremor and Tremor Count with Coin effects.

dataList.name: Modified Power Output
dataList.desc: 1 ally with the most Max HP inflicts +1 Tremor with the effects of their attack skills/coins.

dataList.name: Combat Shield
dataList.desc:
If targeted by 2 or more attacks at the start of the combat phase, gain 2 Defense Level Up.
If at 50% or less HP at the start of the combat phase, gain 3 Defense Level Up.

dataList.name: Your Shield
dataList.desc: If 1 ally with the highest Max HP is targeted by 2 or more attacks, gain 3 Defense Level Up

dataList.name: Territory Protection
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, apply 2 Defense Level Up to the 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard.

dataList.name: Territory Protection
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, apply 2 Defense Level Up to the 2 allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard.
If the allies' HP is below 50%, apply an additional 2 Defense Level Up

dataList.name: Protection Request Received
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, apply 2 Defense Level Up to the ally with the lowest HP percentage
If target's HP is below 50%, apply an additional 2 Defense Level Up
